title: Eco-Smart Retreat with Fireplace in Kazimierz Dolny’s Historic Core
description: Discover a thoughtfully designed 2-bedroom, 1-bathroom apartment offering modern eco-features, nestled on the picturesque Rynek. Boasting a comfortable 63 sqm layout, this home harmoniously blends traditional charm and a focus on sustainability. High-performance energy-efficient windows and a cozy fireplace create both comfort and efficiency throughout the seasons. The apartment’s open-plan living area flows out to a dedicated barbecue zone—ideal for al fresco moments, while entry is secure and convenient via an automatic gate.
neighborhood_description: Situated in the artistic heart of Kazimierz Dolny, Rynek exudes a tranquil, village-like ambiance while remaining steps from local galleries, charming cafés, and green spaces. The neighborhood values eco-living and offers ample biking opportunities, friendly streets, and close proximity to reputable schools—perfect for families or outdoor enthusiasts.
lifestyle_benefits: walkable to cultural venues and parks
lower utility costs due to eco-features
target_buyer: Eco-conscious buyers seeking a quiet, cultural lifestyle—singles, couples, or small families who desire a mix of modern sustainability with authentic historic atmosphere.
market_positioning: A rare opportunity for sustainable living in Kazimierz Dolny’s most beloved location, uniquely combining modern technology with local heritage; this property appeals to buyers seeking premium comfort and energy efficiency within a peaceful, low-urban setting.
